short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to pick the RGB,HEX,and HSL code from ANYWHERE on your screen

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy and fast extension to pick the color code of a pixel from ANYWHERE on your screen. Click the extension logo, click on the pixel you want to take the color code from , and here we go ,the color code is directly copied to your clipboard !
